comment: Incredibly talented, knowledgeable, and inspirational. Also has sky-high standards, tough and sometimes unclear critiques, and overall was the most difficult professor I've ever taken. You will learn valuable lessons at the cost of your sleep. Acts more as a client rather than a mentor and wants projects in his preferred style.

2nd year studio. Doesn't understand the time it takes to complete assignments, so he gives a lot. At the beginning of each project the pace is good, but the FINAL deliverables are rushed, and you can't finish.  If you are okay with modernism then you will be fine, but if you like anything remotely traditional then DON'T TAKE HIM!

Professor Uddin is a great professor for DECOM II. Having him online during COVID, made this class easy for me to learn key factors for my architecture journey. He went step by step how to use Adobe software and Revit, which made it so much easier to do studio projects. I received a B, but I was also in the process learning new programs. Nice guy.

comment: Like to get this teacher again.

Extremely talented in his profession. (Good part)  I can knit pick on all of the negatives,(read the other reviews), but that will take too long.  Overall work hard, and you will do fine.  He will make you better, but you will have a headache.

He makes you sign an attendance sheet every day of studio. It will make u think that it actually matters, but it really doesnt cause ur grade will be the overall of whatever the jury gives u during reviews. He doesn't add his own input to ur final grade. He's far from being a good professor. He doesnt listen, he doesnt help, he will own ur project!

Very very good and understandable for Design Communications.  (Uddin made this class for the school) Take him!!! he will tell you everything you need to know and even give personal examples.  Very experienced drafter

Doesnt care as much for your grade as his reputation as a professor.  Has favorite students and prefers to teach them.  He is understandable and really knows what he is talking about but he is very biased and extremely moody.  Dont take for studio classes!!!
Great guy to talk to.  Not always helpful on projects.
Expects a lot but you will learn a lot also. I recommend for Design Communication classes.
Expects a lot, but without giving the tools...
